summary: Emily is a Marriageable NPC follower that I created. This is my first ever mod so I hope you enjoy it :)
descriptionHtml:
VERSION 2.0 IS OUT! This version is much better because it allows you to give her what YOU want her to were and also I have made her a level 1 so she can level up with you instead of her being a level 81 like she was in Version 1.0.
==============
Requirements
==============

For this mod to work you MUST have the ApachiiSkyHair mod installed: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

==========================
Recommended Requirements
==========================

All of these mods are on Skyrim Nexus so if you don\'t use Skyrim Nexus I\'m sorry I cannot help you because I do not have permission to upload the mods to the Steam Workshop.These mods are not essential requirements but are recommended if you want Emily to look like she does in the picture.

ApachiiSkyHair: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

No More Blocky Faces: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30/?tab=2&navtag=/ajax/modimages/?user=0|:|id=30

Covereyes: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869

CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554/

Better Females by Bella: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812

==========
Location
==========

You will find Emily located in Jorrvaskr in Whiterun, When you enter Jorrvaskr you should see Emily across the other side of the room to the left a little sitting on a bench.

================
Emily\'s Inventory
================

When you first recruit Emily as a follower she will be wearing Daedric Armor with no helmet, as seen in the picture and will have equipped 2 Daedric Daggers.


PLEASE INFORM ME IF THIS MOD IS NOT WORKING FOR YOU IN ANY WAY AND I WILL TO MY BEST TO HELP YOU TO FIX IT.


Please rate, download and leave any feedback or requests for features/suggestions of what you think should be added to the mod in future updates or questions you have regarding this mod in the comment section :)
author: DOM098652
